title: "Machine Learning Sorts Ancient Pottery Fragments"
excerpt: "According to a statement released by Northern Arizona University, researchers Leszek Pawlowicz and Chris Downum used a form of machine learning known as Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) to sort pottery fragments into stylistic categories."
